title: Telegraph Sale ‘Middleman’ Nadhim Zahawi is a Guest of UAE at COP28
description:
DUBAI — Conservative MP Nadhim Zahawi is attending the COP28 climate summit as a guest of the United Arab Emirates, DeSmog can reveal – prompting questions about his role as the intermediary in the host country’s prospective takeover of a major British newspaper. An investment fund backed by the UAE has reached an agreement to […]
